name: Super Shape Shooter
description:
Simple, fast-paced free-for-all deathmatch game and tons of unlockable hats! 

Super Shape Shooter is a 2D Mutliplayer Shooter platformer. Choose from three different classes and play in five different maps against your friends and have some gun n jump fun in hilarious epic matches. 

Features:

  • 2D Online Multiplayer Shooter
  • Play against bots
  • 5 different maps
  • 3 different characters
  • tons of hats

#web #multiplayer #online #shooter
